list.name: Changes
list.comment:
- final commit
merging dev into main

task.summary: Default task
- Test Commit
- Completed first assignment tutor video
- Completed first assignment tutor video

- Completed second assignment video
got some basic music player bootstrap code online and began personalising it to project

- moving things around and getting the front end looking nicer
containerising the play and proc buttons and adding some basic stying

- first movement session complete
styling beginning to take shape - starting to understand the containerisation aspect of react / passing procs down endlessly

- trying to mess with the repl styling
trying to mess with the styling of the Repl minor success, the scroll bars being a cunt though

- fixed reply scrollbar issue
looking at how to go about parsing the songText and getting my head around how to reactify methods

- started work on parser logic
still need to work out regex or rule for finding the block title / plug into volume control

- renamed songeText parser
realised my regex idea is only going to work for instrument groups and if I want to grab anything else Ill need to come up with another solution

- pre experiment commit
realised getting the text out is the easy part putting the text back in is tricky. need a cleanish commit to revert back to while I throw stuff at the problem

- working through the songtext problem
Im ignoring getting the instrument blocks back into the songText for now and worshipping at the altar of regexes to deal with the fact that instrument blocks can be both a stack() and not a stack() (im going to be very upset if instrument blocks can be other things other than stack or not stack)

- finished volume change logic
I hope.

- had a crack at returning the instrument blocks to the song text
need to get my head around passing the variables and handlers around then I can test

- volume logics all there
now to fix the broken mess

- fixed errors that stopped the page loading
logic still doesnt work -_-

- its all pretty broken
Theres issues in the parser's returned text - most likely my regex sucks

- fixed getInstrumentBlocks
added the logic I missed for adding the line to the code block each loop
fixed list push logic that meant I was pushing a new version of each instrument block each loop

- have the adding gain functionality working
I just cant get the blocks to go back into the songText properly - clean commit while its mostly working

- replacing the text works now
but now appending the gain values is cooked

- volume works for the most part
still some tweaks to be made but proof of concept is there
starting on fixing styling and audio controls for presentation

- A lot of styling has happened
committing while its not broken

- it actually looks not bad
finished the lions share of styling will present the app as is and make minor tweaks before the due date

- final tweaks before presentation
made the styling for the mixer match the play controls more
- final tweaks 2

- Improved Instrument Blocks
improved the re-useability of the instrument blocks ahead of implementing further features

- toggle button generation
started toggle button logic toggle buttons are now generated based on which instrument blocks are present

- toggle button functionality
added some logic for toggling instrument blocks on and off - the toggle on/off display is behaving delayed, commiting before trying to figure out why

- sorted checkbox animations
passed in toggleState from the element that changes so the react re-render is triggered
fixed minor bug cause by instrument blocks re fetching everytime songText Updates

- toggle button minor bug fixes
fixed the rendering for toggle buttons so that they actually disappear when an instrumentBlock is removed

- fixed delay in volume control
fixed a bug that cause the volume to be one range step behind what the current gain value is

- started work on mute functionality
got the boilerplate for muting various instrument blocks, realised I had a bunch of bugs in my checkbox toggling system so returned to the old way I was doing it with a few tweaks, and added a use effect that keeps the instrument blocks consistent between songtext updates

- fixed mute and render bugs
added a new list to the handle mute funciton because react wont re render if I use the mutated instrument blocks??? why does this work? whatever it works now.
fixed my toggle/mute logic so it behaves in the way a user would expect

- started CPS editing logic
logic mostly there and props are passing through to the component properly
its still not working but commiting as at a good reset point

- bpm working
plugged in replacing the CPS parser method
changed regex to account for the bpm value in the songtext being null sometimes

- moved checkboxes + bugfixes
moved checkboxxes so there function is more obvious
added guards for changing cpm so that the user cant enter invalid inputs

- other slider effects
have made a copy of the volume logic that is able to handle multiple effects and only work on toggled instruments

- finished slider logic
slider logic implemented completely, it works but the low band filter and high band filter don't behave properly so I will need to tweak values but the core is there... and works... finally

- adding json functionality
added download function to download current song adding upload/load functionality now

- json functionality done
can save and load in json files

- completed basic D3 graph
created a basic single bar D3 graph that visually represents the gain across the track
i've also noticed the low pass filter sucks so will replace with another control before adding finishing touches and recording demo

- fixed BOM validation bug
fixed a bug cause by parseInt() ignore trailing letters and wrongfully passing validation

- swapped low band filter for pitch modulator
swapped as the low band filter wasn't super user-friendly
fixed minor bug with vertical sliders
- fixed minor naming bug

- fixed loading bug
user can now edit loaded songs

- changes to song structure
made preparations for next and back cycling through songs
changed tunes to hold a dictionary of tunes
plugged in an array of these tunes into the main app.js and swapped repl loading to use this array

- multiple songs achieved
added final logic for changing the songs and created props for song title and artist for the player component

- final touches
fixed small double loading error added comments to help explain the regex madness

- final commit
merging dev into main

- Improved Instrument Blocks
improved the re-useability of the instrument blocks ahead of implementing further features

- toggle button generation
started toggle button logic toggle buttons are now generated based on which instrument blocks are present

- toggle button functionality
added some logic for toggling instrument blocks on and off - the toggle on/off display is behaving delayed, commiting before trying to figure out why

- sorted checkbox animations
passed in toggleState from the element that changes so the react re-render is triggered
fixed minor bug cause by instrument blocks re fetching everytime songText Updates

- fixed delay in volume control
fixed a bug that cause the volume to be one range step behind what the current gain value is

got the boilerplate for muting various instrument blocks, realised I had a bunch of bugs in my checkbox toggling system so returned to the old way I was doing it with a few tweaks, and added a use effect that keeps the instrument blocks consistent between songtext updates

- fixed mute and render bugs

logic mostly there and props are passing through to the component properly

- adding json functionality
added download function to download current song adding upload/load functionality now

- json functionality done
can save and load in json files

- completed basic D3 graph
created a basic single bar D3 graph that visually represents the gain across the track
i've also noticed the low pass filter sucks so will replace with another control before adding finishing touches and recording demo

- fixed BOM validation bug
fixed a bug cause by parseInt() ignore trailing letters and wrongfully passing validation

- swapped low band filter for pitch modulator

fixed minor bug with vertical sliders
- fixed minor naming bug

- fixed loading bug
user can now edit loaded songs

- changes to song structure
made preparations for next and back cycling through songs
changed tunes to hold a dictionary of tunes
plugged in an array of these tunes into the main app.js and swapped repl loading to use this array

- multiple songs achieved
added final logic for changing the songs and created props for song title and artist for the player component

- final touches
fixed small double loading error added comments to help explain the regex madness

- final commit
merging dev into main
